author: Glass Reflection
description:
I've been hearing that this past Summer Season was the best in Years. I have some thoughts.

AND HEY! I'M IN A PODCAST CALLED "QUEST FOR THE BEST"!
Where Geoff (Mother's Basement) Thew, Miles (Formerly Crunchyroll) Atherton, and I are trying to determine the Top 100 anime of all time! Check out our first episode:
►YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V7-dzt-5-ak
►Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/quest-for-the-best-with-tristan-miles-geoff/id1812347353 
►Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/6k0rRm2wrzLKt8oewdKLRE

For those who watched the video. NOW GO WATCH MILKY SUBWAY:
https://youtu.be/BmcksAVjK7o?si=5_VHo5PWPTpMmCW7

Play around with the audio and Subtitles settings to your liking. 


► Support me on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/Arkada
► Follow me on Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/arkada.bsky.social

#Anime #Discussion #2025 #Dandadan #MilkySubway #AnimeAnalysis #Analysis #Opening #OP #ED #GlassReflection
title: Summer 2025 Was Overrated
